name: Marzipan
description:
Marzipan is a 2D platformer shooter where you play as a little astronaut fighting aliens to try to get back home. Utilize the floaty moon gravity to maneuver around enemies and reach far away platforms to get back to your ship.

Made in 2017-2018 by a group of UMBC students as a part of the UMBC Game Developer's Club.

It's a very short game we made for fun and to gain more game dev experience. Hope you enjoy!
